CIXGEN Composite Index

Business Valuation Total Revenue Members CIX Utilities
CIXGEN Updates $10,000,000 USD $30,000 USD $45,000 USD $50,000 USD
CIXGEN Forecast

Definition

CIXGEN Market Valuation based on investors commitment to the amount of funding in CIXGEN business activity. With the CIXGEN valuation, we incorporated the formulations for a weighted average of the valuation amount based on the token supply. This will contribute to the composite index price of CIX tokens

CIXGEN’s revenues are based on sales of products and services, lifestyle centres and franchise centres. With the CIXGEN company revenue, we incorporated the formulation for weighted average of the total revenue based on the token supply. This will contribute to the composite I index price of CIX tokens.

CIXGEN’s membership are based on our number of members times the membership fee. With the CIXGEN company memberships, we ncorporated the formulation for weighted average of the value of memberships based on the token supply. This will contribute to the composite I index price of CIX tokens.

CIXGEN’s CIX token utilities are based on the transaction volume of CIX tokens within CIXCHANGE. With the CIX token transaction volume, we ncorporated the formulation for weighted average of the transaction amount based on the token supply. This will contribute to the composite I index price of CIX tokens.

CixChange is a self regulating exchange that offers the best OTC services for our CIX Coins with other major cryptocurrencies. CIX Coin is backed by fundamental business values!
